snippet.title: Pain behind Guy's transformation
snippet.content: IT IS a whole new Guy. His body transformation has had the whole country talking and now The Daily Telegraph can reveal the images from The award-winning singer has revealed to the magazine he was on a downward spiral when he decided to embark on a health kick. "I was drinking too much. I wasn't eating well. And everything I thought I was doing right wasn't working," Sebastian said. For years the father of two said he tried to shrug-off comments about his body. "As a guy you pretend it doesn't affect you. But it does," he said. , the singer started the new "it" ketogenic diet which drastically reduced his carb intake. "Early on, Jules and I went through one week where we were disgustingly hungry and whining about it," he said. "But that passes. I don't obsess about food anymore." featuring Guy Sebastian is on sale today, August 7. Originally published as
